name: AD: Combat Jump
desc: Place a Circular Template to be the Drop Zone. The template must be clear of all obstructions. Place yourself completely inside the Drop Zone. On PH Roll, remove template. On PH Fail, you scatter 16 inches from your final location. Share Open Information.

name: Assault
desc: Target an enemy in your LoF at least within the sum of your MOV. Move into base to base contact and perform a CC attack at a -3 mod.

name: Berserk
desc: Your CC Attacks may be either Berserk or Assault attacks. Berserk gives a +6 Attack MOD and turns the Face to Face Roll into a Normal Roll for both units in CC. Assault gives a -3 CC MOD, and allows you to move the combined values of your MOV into base to base and make a CC attack as an Entire Order.

name: CH: Limited Camo
desc: During the Deployment Phase, you may deploy in the Camouflaged state. You may not re-enter the Camouflaged state.

name: CH: Mimetism
desc: Opponents make BS Attacks against you at a -3 MOD to the relevant Attribute.

name: CH: Camo
desc: During the Deployment Phase, you may deploy in the Camouflaged state. Opponents make BS attacks against you at a -3 MOD. Grants Surprise Attack, Surprise Shot L1, and Stealth.

name: CH: TO Camo
desc: During deployment, you may deploy in the Hidden Deployment or TO Camo state, and may enter TO Camo state. BS attacks made against you are -6 to the opponent. Grants Surprise Attack, Surprise Shot L1, and Stealth.

name: Chain of Command
desc: If you are in a not-Null state and your army's Lieutenant enters a Null state, you must become the Lieutenant.

name: Climbing Plus
desc: You may treat the Climb Skill as a Short Movement Skill. You may declare other Short Movement Skills, Short Skills, or AROs while along or holding onto a vertical surface.

name: Doctor
desc: Target Unconscious friendly unit in base to base. On WIP Roll, heal 1 W and cancel Unconscious. If failed, targed dies. Can spend Command Token to reroll failure if target has cube.

name: Engineer
desc: Target friendly model in base to base contact. On a Normal WIP Roll, target regains 1 Structure. On a failure, target loses 1 Structure. May also cancel negative states, but if that state is Unconscious, failure kills target.

name: Fireteam: Enomotarchos
desc: You may create a Fireteam with 2 or 3 other figures of the same unit type. You may have more than 1 Enomotarchos team active.

name: Forward Observer
desc: Target enemy in LoF, you may perform a Non-Lethal BS Attack using WIP. If successful, target enters Targeted State. You also have a Flash Pulse.

name: Infiltration
desc: You may deploy anywhere in your half, or may deploy in the opponents half excluding enemy Deployment Zone on Infiltration Roll (Normal PH-3).

name: Inspiring Leadership
desc: You must be your army's Lientenant in order to use this skill. As long as you are in a non-Null state: all troopers have your training, all troopers have V: Courage, and all troopers cannot be affected by Retreat!. You may declare a Coordinated Order that must include you by spending only the Special Lieutenant Order.

name: Kinematika L1
desc: When declaring Dodge or Engage in the Reactive Turn, you may move one additional inch.

name: Kinematika L2
desc: When declaring Dodge or Engage in the Reactive Turn, you may move two additional inches.

name: Martial Arts L1
desc: Gives +1 to CC damage and -3 to Opponent CC. You also have Stealth and V: Courage.

name: Martial Arts L2
desc: Gives +3 to CC Damage, or +1 to CC Damage and -3 to Opponent CC. You also have Stealth and V: Courage.

name: Martial Arts L3
desc: Gives +3 to CC and -3 to Opponent CC, or +3 to CC Damage, or +1 to CC Damage and -3 to Opponent CC. You also have Stealth and V: Courage.

name: Martial Arts L4
desc: Gives +1 to burst, or +3 to CC and -3 to Opponent CC, or +3 to CC Damage, or +1 to CC Damage and -3 to Opponent CC. You also have Stealth and V: Courage.

name: Morat
desc: You ignore Loss of Lieutenant, Retreat!, and Isolated. You automatically pass Guts Rolls. You may make a WP Roll to fail Guts Rolls.

name: Multiterrain
desc: Before deploying, choose one Type of Terrain to specialize in. You may move normally through that Type of Terrain.

name: Number 2
desc: If you are a part of a Fireteam and the Linked Team Leader enters a Null State, the Fireteam must stay active and you must become the Linked Team Leader unless the Fireteam would have less than 3 members.

name: Religious
desc: Pass Guts Rolls automatically. May make a WP Roll to fail Guts Roll. Cannot Retreat.

name: Shock Immunity
desc: You are immune to Shock Special Ammunition and treat it like Normal Ammunition.

name: Stealth
desc: Active turn only. You may make Cautious Movements inside the ZoC of an enemy. A Short Movement Skill inside an enemy's ZoC but outside his LoF does not grant AROs.

name: V: Courage
desc: Choose the outcome of any of this troopers Guts Rolls. Unaffected by Retreat.

name: V: Dogged
desc: When you would go Unconscious, you may place a Dogged Marker instead. If you do, at the end of the turn, this unit dies. A Dogged unit may not be healed.

name: V: No Wound Incapacitation
desc: When you would go Unconscious, you may place a No Wound Imcapacitation marker instead. If you do, you do not enter Unconscious, and may proceed as normal until you take another Wound.
